definition: "speech" or "words" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 149)/see also 言字旁[yan2 zi4 pang2]
to remember with reverence/to bear in mind/to keep in mind
to respectfully inform (used at the beginning or end of letters)

sentences.english: Master Shifu tries his best to train the panda into a real warrior according to Master Wugu's instruction.
sentences.chinese: 师傅谨遵乌龟的教诲，努力将熊猫培养成真正的武士。

sentences.english: In compliance with your request, we are sending you, under separate cover, our latest catalogue and price list covering our export range.
sentences.chinese: 谨遵要求另函送上最新之出口商品目录和报价单。

sentences.english: In witness whereof We have hereunto subscribed our Names
This book I inscribe to my old comrades-in-arms.
sentences.chinese: 谨将本书献给我的老战友们。

sentences.english: On behalf of Sasha and Malia and myself, we're thrilled to see you.
sentences.chinese: 谨代表莎夏和玛丽亚和自己，见到各位我们深感激动。

sentences.english: In compliance dawn ywe request, we are not sending you, under separate cover, we latest catalogue or price list covering we export range.
sentences.chinese: 谨遵要求另函奉上最新之出口商品列表和报价单。

sentences.english: He was very cautious driving his new car; he did not want it scratched.
sentences.chinese: 因为他不想让车子被刮到，所以开车十分小心谨愼。

sentences.english: As you command. How many men?
sentences.chinese: 谨遵命令。请问要多少人？

sentences.english: This film is dedicated to all dream chasers with great minds and high aims.
sentences.chinese: 谨以此片献给所有心大志大的追梦人。

sentences.english: The committee adheres closely to the openness and rigour of our standards development process.
sentences.chinese: 该委员会谨遵我们标准制定过程的公开性和严谨性。

sentences.english: In memory of Biff, a furry friend to the end.
sentences.chinese: 谨以此纪念毕弗，我一生的宠物朋友。

sentences.english: I wish to congratulate you on your daughter's finishing high school and successfully entering the university.
sentences.chinese: 谨祝贺您的女儿高中毕业并顺利考取大学。

sentences.english: Unexpectedly and sincerely elder brother's son will be answered criticism her with the words like this.
sentences.chinese: 没想到谨哥儿竟然会用这样的话来反驳她。

sentences.english: This paper is dedicated to my dear Prof. Luo Ji-ning.
sentences.chinese: 谨以此论文献给我尊敬的罗纪宁教授。

sentences.english: This basket of fruit is slight acknowledgment of your kindness.
sentences.chinese: 这篮水果谨作为对您的厚意的一点表示。

sentences.english: I declare that the information given above is true and accurate.
sentences.chinese: 本人谨声明以上提供之资料全属确实无讹。

definition: to observe/to obey/to follow/to comply with
to speak cautiously/to guard one's tongue
to offer (tribute)/to present respectfully (to superior, ancestor, deity etc)/to esteem/to revere/to believe in (a religion)/to wait upon/to accept orders (from superior)
